1: <pb/>Ay..., ob'iltac val chon̈ab' Jerusalén, scuch Yaltar Dios, b'aj ec'nac cajan vin̈aj David. Ec'ocab' juntzan̈ q'uin̈ tz'ec'taxoni.
2: <pb/><t>A Dios ol ac'anoch eb' anima d'a jun chon̈ab' tic d'a ilc'olal yed' d'a cusc'olal. Ol laj c'acvoc eb' yab'an syail. Axo jun chon̈ab' tic, icha junoc altar ol ajcan d'a yichan̈ Dios.</t>
3: <t>Ol scheccot soldado Jehová yic tzul yoyan sb'a eb' d'a spatictac Jerusalén tic, ol sb'oanoch jun muro eb' b'aj ol och oyan d'a spatictac chi'. Ol sb'oanpaxoch sb'achte' eb' yic syac'an oval eb' yed'oc.</t>
4: <t>Ol ac'joc telvoc Jerusalén, ichato ol ec'can telan d'a sat luum, axo d'a sat lum chi' ol lolonq'ue eb' aj chon̈ab' chi'. Toxon̈ej ol q'ue b'ulnaj eb' slolon d'a cal pococ, icha slolon junoc mach yed' spixan chamnac.</t>
5: <t>Axo ol ajoc, elan̈chamel ol yac'och yaelal Jehová d'a yib'an̈ masanil eb' ayoch ajc'olal d'a Jerusalén tic. Ol mac'vaj c'u, ol ec' quixcab', ol ec' nivac oval ic'n̈ab' ayxo smay sc'an̈i yed' nivac c'ac' satanel tastac. A eb' ajc'ol chi', man̈xo jantacoc sb'isul eb', palta lajan ol ajcan eb' icha lum pococ. A eb' tzex ixtani, ol ic'chajcanb'at eb' icha tz'aj yic'chajb'at smatz'il ixim trigo yuj ic'.</t>
7: <t>Masanil juntzan̈ chon̈ab' man̈xo b'ischajb'enoc chi', aton eb' tz'ac'an oval yed' jun chon̈ab' scuch yaltar Dios, oymajnac eb' d'a spatic, spojanem smuroal eb', lajan ol yutoc sb'a eb' icha junoc mach ay tas svayichej d'ac'valil.</t>
8: <t>A mach ay svejel svayichej sva'i, palta axo yic tz'el svayan̈, an̈eja' yoch svejel. Ma icha mach stacji sti' svaycani, axo d'a svayich, syuq'uej a' syila', palta axo yic tz'el svayan̈, an̈eja' stacji sti', taquin̈ q'uilinac yol sjaj. Icha chi' ol aj yelc'och juntzan̈ chon̈ab' man̈xo b'ischajb'enoc ayoch yac'an oval yed' tzalan Sion tic.</t>
9: <t>Ex aj Jerusalén, b'eyan̈ecn̈ej yed' e man̈ pensaril, ichato max eyil jab'oc. Ec'an̈ecn̈ej quetcon icha uc'um an̈, vach'chom malaj an̈ tzeyuq'uej.</t>
10: <t>Yujto a Jehová ix ac'ancot jun nivan vayan̈ d'a eyib'an̈. Axo eb' syaloch sb'a schecab'oc Dios tz'ilan tas sjavi d'a eyib'an̈ chi'. A Jehová ix macan spensar eb', icha tz'aj smacchaj sat junoc mach svay yed' junoc c'apac.</t>
11: <t>Yuj chi' masanil tas syal eb' schecab' Dios, lajan ol ajcan icha tas tz'ib'ab'ilcan d'a junoc tas, palta to macan, ayoch selloal. Tato tz'alchaj d'a junoc mach syal yavtani: Avtej jun um tic, tato xchi d'ay, syalan icha tic: Max yal-laj vavtani, yujto macan, ayoch selloal, xchi.</t>
12: <t>Tato tz'ac'chajpax d'a junoc mach to max yal yavtani: Avtej jun tic, tato xchi d'ay, syalani: Max yal-laj vavtani, xchi.</t>
13: <t>Yuj chi' ix yal Jehová d'ayin icha tic: A juntzan̈ anima tic, stz'ac yal eb' to tzin yic'chaan̈ eb', stz'acan yal eb' to ay velc'och d'a yol sat eb', palta axo val spensar eb' najat yajcanel d'ayin. Stz'ac yaq'uem sb'a eb' d'ayin, palta an̈ej juntzan̈ schecnab'il eb' anima snaq'uei, a syac' eb' c'ayb'ajoc.</t>
14: <t>Yuj chi' a juntzan̈ tas satub'tac yilji ol in ch'ox yil jun chon̈ab' tic, toxon̈ej ol sat sc'ol eb' yuuj. A sjelanil eb' jelan yed' yaj pensaril eb' aj pensar, ol sateloc, xchi Jehová.</t>
15: <t>Ob'iltac val eb' te vach' syutej sc'ub'anel tas nab'il yuuj yed' tastac sc'ulej eb' d'a elc'altac d'a Jehová yalani. Syalan eb' icha tic: Malaj mach tzon̈ ilani, malaj mach tzon̈ ojtacaneli, xchi eb'.</t>
16: <t>Palta a ex tic, q'uexan̈ tzeyutej. ¿Tocval lajan lum tz'acb'il lum yed' mach stz'acani? ¿Tom syal yalan lum d'a mach stz'acan chi' icha tic: Man̈oc ach ix in a tz'aca'? Mato syal lum icha tic: A ach tic man̈ ojtacoc tas tza c'ulej, ¿tocval xchi lum d'ay?</t>
17: <t>Quenxon̈ej val tiempo ol ochcan lum yax luum b'aj sb'o munlajel, axo lum b'aj sb'otaxon munlajel chi', ol ochcan lum yax lumal.</t>
18: <t>A d'a jun c'ual chi', a eb' max ujitaxon yab'ani, ol yab' eb' yavtaj junoc tas tz'ib'ab'il. Axo eb' max uji yilani, ol yil eb', ichato ol ic'chajelta eb' d'a scal q'uic'alq'uinal.</t>
19: <t>A eb' emnaquil yaji, ol te tzalaj eb' d'a Jehová. A eb' te meb'a', ol te tzalaj eb' d'a sDiosal Israel Axon̈ej Ochi.</t>
20: <t>A eb' malaj yelc'och yetanimail d'a sat, ol lajvoquem eb'. A eb' pit syutej sb'a, man̈xo junoc eb' olto canoc. A eb' an̈ej chucal sna'a, ol satel eb',</t>
21: <t>aton eb' snaanq'ue esal lolonel d'a spatic yetanimail. Aton eb' scachan eb' juez yic max ac'jioch syaelal eb' chuc, syac'an es eb' yic man̈ tojoloc tz'aj sb'o yaj d'a eb' malaj smul.</t>
22: <t>Yuj chi' a Jehová sDiosal Israel, Jun coljinaccanel vin̈aj Abraham, a tz'alan icha tic: A ticnaic ex in chon̈ab', ex yin̈tilal vin̈aj Jacob, man̈xa b'aj ol ex q'uixvoc, man̈xa b'aj ol chacb'oc e sat yuj q'uixvelal.</t>
23: <t>Yujto a eb' eyin̈tilal ol yil eb' tas ol in c'ulej d'a scal, ol yojtaquejel eb' to A inxon̈ej Ochi, nivan ol aj velc'och d'a yol sat eb', a in e Diosal in israel ex tic.</t>
24: <t>A eb' ayoch d'a somc'olal, ol sc'ayb'ej jelanil eb', a eb' b'uchumtac ol scha yab' c'ayb'ub'al eb', xchi Jehová.</t>
